Protein Names: Polypeptide N-acetylgalactosaminyltransferase 17 (EC 2.4.1.41) (Polypeptide GalNAc transferase-like protein 3) (GalNAc-T-like protein 3) (pp-GaNTase-like protein 3) (Protein-UDP acetylgalactosaminyltransferase-like protein 3) (UDP-GalNAc:polypeptide N-acetylgalactosaminyltransferase-like protein 3) (Williams-Beuren syndrome chromosomal region 17 protein homolog)
